item.title: Beginnings
item.description: Beginnings While I’ve blogged before, there is a need to have a common place to put development updates, tricks learned, and simply to show off when I think I’m being particularly clever. So exists this place to serve that purpose.
item.content:
Beginnings

While I’ve blogged before, there is a need to have a common place to put development updates, tricks learned, and simply to show off when I think I’m being particularly clever.

So exists this place to serve that purpose.
